website_summaries.verdict: This curved UHD TV offers an immersive option at a reasonable price. Available in 55- or 65-inch sizes.
pros: For those looking to add to their home theater, this curved model is a great choice that is far cheaper than most Samsung smart TVs
Customers love the rich colors and impressive built-in speakers
cons: The pre-installed apps clutter the menu somewhat, and the remote is frustrating to use

website_summaries.verdict: Nicely priced curved smart TV that includes HDR technology to result in outstanding image quality.
pros: TV is 4K ready, so it’s going to provide excellent longevity
Curved screen is perfectly designed for an outstanding viewing experience
Contains the latest processor technology to ensure the TV can keep up with the action

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV for reasonable price, don't overpay for the QLED get this curve instead
customer_reviews.text: Wow, i'm going from 2015 Samsung 55" to this 2019 Samsung 65" Curve, picture quality and motion rate and the UHD 4K quality makes a huge difference. Samsung hasn't changed their remotes much...lol, but picture quality + curve makes it come to life. I Highly recommend this product, don't waster your money on those expensive QLEDs, this curve is just as good. My brother bought a QLED and I don't see much difference.
customer_reviews.author: Taha

customer_reviews.title: Very-very well made, Beautiful picture.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I got this, beautiful picture. I love this Tv very easy to set up and network with all your extensions. I had it out of the box, plugged up, networked, and set up my Alexa echo Dot/ sound bar/ PS4/ Samsung sex station/ and cable box all hooked up in about an hour very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Best TV I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: The picture is so good its distracting from the show. The depth of the colors and the quality are awesome. If you are on the fence about getting this TV,...just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Carreras

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised but it is great!
customer_reviews.text: Description is bad. It’s not a flat screen. It does not come with the smart remote as shown but it does come with a hard to use remote. Besides that I love this TV! It’s my second Samsung in the house. Fix the issues I listed and I will change the star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Andy

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️ this tv
customer_reviews.text: So happy I purchased a curved tv. Delivered in my home. Setup was easy. Bright vivid clarity
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M. Bury

customer_reviews.title: Curved TV Samsung
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV I love it already I use it with my ps4 the picture quality is amazing
customer_reviews.author: jon Breuer

customer_reviews.title: full of bugs and ads
customer_reviews.text: This TV looks great. Although the curves dont do much. However, it includes a lot of ads and apps that you can't remove or disable, and that's really annoying (who wants to be forced to watch or see ads when you just bought an expensive tv?). It also loses internet connection almost every time you turn it off (the forums are full of complaints).you basically have to reset the TV by holding down the power button on the remote until it resets. EVERY TIME. It's really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: gt2000

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely horribly wrong
customer_reviews.text: Ended up receiving a 43'' FLAT SCREEN instead. Speechless and horrible. I will NEVER purchase a TV without seeing it in person EVER AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising (terrible TV)
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 55' 4k curved screen, and every channel, movie, and all apps are distorted. This TV has been falsely advertised. I've never seen an actual clear screen. There's hardly any settings for the TV, so you have no way to adjust picture or sound quality. It's also nonrefundable. It also doesn't come with a smart remote as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Turner Gray

customer_reviews.title: It will fail
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this TV, they have a high screen failure rate, do some research before purchasing. Samsung does not stand behind the product. Luckily Amazon stepped up and accepted the return.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hush

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: This TV blew my expectations away. I will never by another TV again that is NOT Samsung. The picture is beautiful, and the curv ads a little extra. Personally, to get the beautiful picture you need to change the picture settings, but after, it's stunning. Extremely easy to setup, and very user friendly. The remote ads a nice touch being able to click on Netflix, hulu, and Amazon Prime right away. All In all, I am extremely pleased, and would highly recommend to anyone looking to upgrade. For the price, you can't beat it. I had a 4K LG UHD before I purchased this, and there is no comparison. The Samsung wins.
customer_reviews.author: Clockwork

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Got this TV on sale during black Friday and it sounded like great deal... But this TV sucks! 4k/120hrz? HA! Nothing looks good being played on this TV! The TV I "upgraded" from (that's 7 years old) has a much crisper image and frame-rate even though it's only a 1080p/60hrz Vizio! My suggestion to you is, if the price sounds too good to be true, it probably is...
customer_reviews.author: J. Leis

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my tv! It’s really more than just a tv, it’s a whole new viewing experience! Don’t hesitate to get one of these as the television companies are soon fazing the curved tv’s out! My decision on whether or not to buy curved vs flat was when I realized that I always got stuck staring at them in the showrooms. And when you get it set up at home you’ll know you made the right choice! It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tim K. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Came with a giant crack from the left side to the middle, blackening out the tv for the most part. Pretty bummed was looking forward to it and now they don't have the same tv to replace.
customer_reviews.author: David Tadiello

customer_reviews.title: Not completely clear
customer_reviews.text: I got it and the picture was not clear. When it was an action shot it blurred and even on closeups it wasnt crystal clear. I sent it back after one day. I have the dtv 4k box and a new denon 4 kreceiver and that did not make a difference
customer_reviews.author: James R. Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: So first thing is I went from a Hisense 4k to this Samsung 55 inch curved 4k tv. the shipping was super fast. So this tv is amazing. The picture quality is awesome. The sound for this tv is very nice. I couldn't believe how easy the setup was, I have a Samsung smart phone and it set my TV for me. I am glad I made the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV but mine came with a crack
customer_reviews.text: Great TV just what I wanted. It does catch a lot of glaring from certain angles so watching TV while cooking can get annoying but I expected that prior to purchasing. The reason for 3 stars is that it arrived with a cracked screen near the bottom. It's not very noticeable if you dont realize it's there. Not sure if its worth sending it back though. The TV is very thin so I highly recommend two set of hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hill

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Samsung smart TVs last only a few years
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Samsung is making TVs to only last over two years. I bought a Samsung smart TV 55 inches over two years ago. It just stopped working. Nothing we did to it but it would not turn on at all. Warranty is over so Tough Luck. To repair is almost more expensive than the cost of a new TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice !
customer_reviews.text: Second time's a charm for me . First one showed up a day before expected delivery , DOA with a broken screen . Amazon's return process was the least painful I've ever experienced ! UPS picked up the busted one the next day , (yesterday) and the replacement arrived today ! The display is crisp , clear , and captivating ! The sound from this is better than my RCA '55 with a sound bar , using just the TV's speakers . I am using this as a computer monitor and just love it ! ... And Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOPE
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv! Picture is dope, hella big screen with a curve! Love it. Sound is greate although you should still get a sound bar because they dope. I love smoking a dubbie and spcaing out on the quilty of the picture and color! Gameing is dope! I think if u like dope thangs you should buy this tv! its qulity dope! Who cares if it 900! SEND IT! ITS DOPE! YOU CAN FINANCE IT THATS DOPE! GO AHEAD TRY AND TRY TO FIND A DOPER TV!. YOU CANT! THIS IS DOPEST!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse T.

customer_reviews.title: not as smart as i thougt
customer_reviews.text: it doesnt have bixby very hard to use remote control the quality of the picture is good because of uhd processor but if u are playing games or watching fast scene u might want to consider getting the premium one with 240 hz motion rate they sell it here on amazon because this one is 60 hz motion rate its a great television for people that dont pay attention to those things but if u watching games or sports spend a little more and get the hz 120 to 240
customer_reviews.author: yunon zavulonov

customer_reviews.title: Broken Upon Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Broken screen, what do I need to do to get this replaced? Just set it up and it had the broken ribbon on the left corner.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Sound blips out randomly!! :((
customer_reviews.text: ****UPDATE**** So...it’s been a few months now, and the sound will randomly blip out for a few seconds. It’s annoying, and I have no idea wth is going on with it. And of course the return/exchange window is open. Awesome picture, awesome sound, don’t really care about the “ads” or whatever on the bottom when you start it up, but SERIOUSLY with that remote? A full star off for that alone. Thing’s tiny, cramped, and nonsensical. I put my firestick back in just for the remote, lol. Aside from that, zero complaints. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tara B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor for a PC
customer_reviews.text: I did have an older curved model and did need a second screen... Ya, I need that much room on my desktop... This one not only is newer but one class above. I almost never use the TV app on the old-one, kind of awkward. It's not the case with this one. The human-interface is simple, intuitive and have allot of app, nice and free stuff like the Pluto TV... It's a nice added value to those TV and make-it worth to pay a little more. I did look at other brand and to me Samsung have the best screen as I'm at arms length from-it and the pixelation doesn't bother-me and the picture is nice and smooth. Love-it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Luc

customer_reviews.title: Backlights are too visible
customer_reviews.text: First, the outcome quality is very good on this tv. Not perfect, but good. I use a sound bar, so I'm not sure of the quality of the sound (didn't even try it). The remote is not as good as the old smart remote. It's serviceable, but not great. The biggest issue with the tv is the backlight bleed on dark shows/movies. The Witcher, for example, had terrible light bleed that was super distracting. I'd return it if I was able. But I can live with it. 100% would not buy again, though.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Missing many channels
customer_reviews.text: Samsungs smart tv is missing about 20 channels that are included standard with Amazon Firestick and Roku. No Fox, Fox Sports, History Channel, NBC and many others. You can not search or download any of these apps/channels. No voice commands with the remote either. Beautiful 4K picture
customer_reviews.author: Exton

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great purchase.....
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase; after a lot of shopping I knew I wanted the curved Samsung and glad that I made this purchase. I had a horrible experience with a 55" RCA that failed in less than 10-mos and dealing with mfg for service I knew I did not want a RCA, Sylvania etc...Curtis International products. The picture quality is theatre quality, there is no problem with the sound - great. Now, I feel like I have a reliable product. Would recommend to others....
customer_reviews.author: Myra D. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, but has light bleed visible.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a good product, nothing stellar. Upgraded from a 55inch 4k LED to this 65inch Curved - The picture quality is obviously better on multiple levels, and overall i'm pleased but temper that behind the fact the lower left of the screen has a clear back light bleed that is actually quite profound, my lower end TV didn't have this. It's the size of an open hand, and very noticeable in darker scenes. However, for what i payed i accept it as a decent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nazarim

customer_reviews.title: Screen broke
customer_reviews.text: When we received it the box wasn’t damaged but the screen was broke!!!
customer_reviews.author: lclovitt

customer_reviews.title: Picture is great, but the advertising that comes on when turned on is annoying
customer_reviews.text: Samsung makes a great product, but I don't like the advertising when I turn it on
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Best tv we've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is excellent and i love the novelty of the curve screen. It definitely stands out. The only thing is during the day it catches abit of glare from the side but still less than an average flat screen... Great value you cant go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C.

customer_reviews.title: would buy another
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for 3 months now and it's perfect. It's obviously not sitting right next to another TV so I can't compare image specifics but sitting 8 ft away from it, it looks spectacular. I wish they were still offering the monthly payment plan on this tv like they were when I purchased it because I'd purchase another for my basement.
customer_reviews.author: jared specht

customer_reviews.title: Best decision I made on TV!
customer_reviews.text: I had a 9 year old 42-inch Visio that continues to operate with no problems, but I really wanted a smart TV in my newly renovated man cave. I spent weeks reviewing and looking at different brands and settled on the curved Samsung. I am so impressed with everything about it — sound, picture quality, and connection to internet. The first time I turned it on, it went through setup mode so smoothly and identified my new off brand Bluetooth sound bar in a jiffy. With the smart TV it already had a direct connection to Amazon Video through the built in app. The TV will save me money cause now I’m gonna cut the cord.
customer_reviews.author: kenbob22

customer_reviews.title: "Alexa compatible" is Samsung BS
customer_reviews.text: I had several TVs to choose from and I stupidly selected this one as it is "Alexa compatible" and this was one of my main objectives. It is not. I have spent hours attempting to make it so. Why not place the smartthings app on the TV? Why not just make TV discoverable so Alexa could find? Why not truth in advertising? I am going to have to purchase another Fire stick...which renders the whole "buy a smart tv" wasted money. Smeh. Picture is pretty nice. Remote is clunky. I am not happy..
customer_reviews.author: Patience Boston

customer_reviews.title: Beware seems to have a few defects
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had a very bad experience with this purchase I ordered the original model unable to connect through Bluetooth or Wi-Fi they sent a replacement unit and I return the original unit. When I receive the replacement unit it turns out that I couldn’t even connect to Wi-Fi and Bluetooth is not recognized at all. I was also not able to sync my cable channels so the smart TV did not work.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Christmas pretty much wrecked with Amazon Customer Service fiasco.
customer_reviews.text: My Amazon Card says I've been a member since 2002. I ordered a TV on Dec. 5th with plenty of time till Christmas. It arrived with the screen cracked. Went through hell trying to get it sent back. NO REFUND after 18 days so far. Really wrecked my budget for Christmas. Amazon says it's UPS. I have no present to replace it. Amazon has my money. Amazon thinks nothing about tying you up for a day jumping through hoops. I can't tell you how much animosity there is for the customer service reps who expect you to do things that take hours. I've missed work on 3 separate days. I can tell you something for sure. I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: michael martin

customer_reviews.title: Thanks now I never want a flat screen again. Buy It.
customer_reviews.text: My first curved TV. It was pakaged very well. Arrived in 2 Days. IT took me and My Wife about 30 minutes to set up and was enjoying the TV. Lots of value for the money. I never want a flat screen again.
customer_reviews.author: David d.

customer_reviews.title: Missing basic applications
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung smart TV is anything but smart. Samsung has a platform that is not supported well by the application development community so most applications are not available. If you use a paid streaming service they might be available otherwise stay away from Samsung Smart TV's ! No Comedy Central, The CW, or even ABC you know the basics. Useless platform!
customer_reviews.author: R1

customer_reviews.title: Good tv for the price
customer_reviews.text: My only negative so far is the remote. For those of us with large hands and arthritis, it's way too small. I didn't believe that I needed all the bells and whistles that this tv has,but I am enjoying finding them all. The picture is clear and colors bright. The sound isn't reasonable either. Seems to be less clear with voices in the lower ranges or low volume speakers. I end up cranking up the volume for that. Otherwise I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality and whata price!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is amazing. I watched Butch Cassidy and the Sundance kid and the clarity and brightness of the picture made the movie look like it was made in recent years. I was amazed. My previous tv was LED 1080p. I was and still am amazed at the quality. Can't say enough about it. The only down side was getting use to how to find everything and organize it. Another plus is samsung offers nearly 60 free channels. Most are junk, but, some are good.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Alexa what? Simplely press the mic on remote..Isn't one!
customer_reviews.text: I purposely picked this tv because I wanted my world to become simple using Samsung and Alexa "Amazon" were I simply say "Alexa, amaze my how simple you make my life." . She's don't want to talk to the tv and the tv has no options to talk to her. At first it was knowledge by Amazon it was a device at first and everything is running off the 2k wifi. The main sell point is easy Alexa, my remote has no mic, so.......wtf?
customer_reviews.author: James Costello

customer_reviews.title: No HomeKit Support
customer_reviews.text: Great looking TV. But it needs Apple HomeKit support. Without it I feel like this TV is from the 1950s.
customer_reviews.author: Simpsonslover1988

customer_reviews.title: Internally cracked upon unboxing and setup
customer_reviews.text: ****UPDATE**** See below rated one - star, delivered broke, AMAZON had the TV replaced for free in 3 days....replacement is perfect and works great! Very pleased by speed of solution. Supposely UPS is coming to take away the original screen as well. Like a previous reviewer mentioned - screen was left side spider cracked causing a black spot and obvious internal cracking on the left - I was given the instant ability to order a replacement and have UPS pick up those fragile disappointment. In 2012 I purchased a 50 inch Toshiba, built like a marine surviving purchase, set up and TWO moves. Anyway - if replacement and pickup goes fine I will adjust my review accordingly - very bummed
customer_reviews.author: Sirius Black

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware bloated with ads.
customer_reviews.text: If not for the “Smart TV” feature set, this would be a great TV. Three months in to the day and now it’s always showing ads in the menus with no option to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my prior 55" 4K Samsung TV which failed from a bad power supply after three years. Unfortunately, after this TV arrived I discovered that it's not compatible with my Samsung HW-J4000 sound bar, so the TV remote won't control the sound bar. The TV also allows almost no resolution control as it has very simple controls. The picture is nothing like the previous Samsung 4k. I'll be looking at replacing it with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Just as we expected...Amazing view!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery as promised. The delivery guys were very helpful for an early morning delivery. The TV arrived in one piece.( no dings). In took me about 40 minutes to install all components. Love the crystal picture quality and curve to the TV. This is our second curved TV and it keeps getting better and better!! An upgrade for my husband's b-day! He loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Roman

customer_reviews.title: Curved TV has more function with correct wall mount
customer_reviews.text: This is my Rhodes Samasung TV purchase and was skeptical of the curved model because I was told only good for straight on viewing. Well put this set in my bedroom where we have two theater chairs and the wall is not directly in front of them but to the left. To combat this I ordered a wall mount with angeling and tilt ability which as you can see looks/functions perfectly. The picture quality is excellent in daylight or dark rooms but can still have some glare to natural light. Easy set up and couldn’t beat the price on Amazon plus fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Byron T. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: TV would not come on after having it for less than 2 months!! Never had a problem with Samsung TVs before; makes me wonder if models are refurbished and Amazon is selling them as new.
customer_reviews.author: Nelsa Brown

customer_reviews.title: 4K but few HDMI's
customer_reviews.text: Really wish they would use one of the bigger companies smart hubs such as alexa or even Android for apps. Also, a single true gripe, you need more (not less) HDMI's... My last one had four and this only has 3. You can use HDMI splitters, but a 4K 8 slot splitter is costly... Beyond that, it seems to be a great TV.
customer_reviews.author: Norman R.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied with this tv. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv. Excellent price and excellent image. Read a lot of upset reviews on the smart features. The ads are not that bad. Very minimal. The smart connections are perfect. Not sure what the other reviewers issues were but I cancelled my order for a fire stick because the smart features work perfect. Netflix, Youtube, vudu, all work great with no streaming issues. Maybe they don’t have a fast enough internet connection? Mine is 500 up and down so maybe that’s why. But overall very happy with this tv.
customer_reviews.author: David Clayton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS TV
customer_reviews.text: We had been using a 55" projection TV which always seemed a bit dark, especially before we had to change the light bulb. I ordered this 65" curved TV and we love it. I can read all the tiny print because the picture is so clear. The Smart TV features are easy to use even for my technologically challenged husband. It just fit where we wanted to put it. My family says the slight curve also makes it easier to see the TV from the side because it seems to reduce the glare. The seller shipped this TV quickly and it arrived in tact. I hope you enjoy it as much as we do.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria G

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable with unacceptable technical support
customer_reviews.text: It drops the HDMI connection frequently. I tracked it to a problem with the HDMI ports. I can recreate the problem. I can demonstrate to the tech the problem. The tech called in once for information and that closed the ticket so he can do nothing except wait for the it drop again so I can call him again to go through this dance again. He is not allowed to call in twice. I have never encountered such an incompetent tech support policy in my life. I will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Reisner

customer_reviews.title: Love this tv and love Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I like very much this curved tv ,I got the 55inches but now I wish I have gotten the 65inch, still good size for my small apartment,it has very good sound. Watching a 4k movie is wonderful in this tv. Also I got it because of the price and good reviews and the fact that I can pay for it 5 payments thanks to Amazon, maybe was cheaper in other stores like Walmart but amazon got my money because they offer payment plan and don't have to pay extra like those furniture stores only tax and that's it, I absolutely love to buy in Amazon and I keep recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Aby_stars2016

customer_reviews.title: Just BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV and was a little skeptical from the reviews. But I must say the delivery was amazing the driver carried the TV into my home so I didn’t have to lift it. The box was perfect and non-damaged. Setting up was straightforward but the legs and the screws are a bit wonky to install. Once done the TV setup is a breeze. However I do think Samsung could update their remote control. It looks like an old DVD player remote and has small buttons for navigating apps and playing movies.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Some issues, but nice
customer_reviews.text: PROS: 4K resolution looks great Curved screen reduces glare for daytime living room watching Easy connectivity, apps work well CONS: Optimum viewing angles seem narrow HDR signals coming from Disney+ and other apps are almost unwatchable because of darkness. Cannot turn off HDR. Bypassed by using Chromecast in HDMI and not using Input Signal Plus. Does not come with matching bolts for wall mounting Relatively heavy
customer_reviews.author: M. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV for the price. I love my Samsung products
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV for my bedroom. It is a nice TV for the price. The sound is not as great as other Samsung TV's I have had in the past. Typically Samsung is a brand that I usually adore. The legs that support the TV could be of better quality. They seem kind of flimsy compared to other TV stand legs that I have had in the past. Hoping that they last longer than what I think they will or that a replacement can be found when they go.
customer_reviews.author: Navy Girl

customer_reviews.title: No univeral remote, no sound bar consistency, not Alexa compliant
customer_reviews.text: When using internal speakers, there is a app that keeps all sound at level. When hooking up to a sound bar this is disabled so when watching TV the sound fluctuates louder when ads come on. I spent 2 hours on phone trying to hook to Alexa to no avail. Moving from cable to streaming is very clunky. I have sent this TV back and would not wish it on anyone.
customer_reviews.author: R T Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with remote promised
customer_reviews.text: Amazon told me this is not their fault that the remote advertised is not the one Included, but manufacturer’s fault. I say in that case, don’t repeat their false advertisement and clarify the remote is a plain standard one. Would avoid my and others complaint about this issue. Otherwise, great tv for a great price. Nothing else to be negative about. Works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: veronique Bise

customer_reviews.title: Set up  for failure
customer_reviews.text: Is it really 2020? Because this TV will not allow a WIFI password more than 12 characters. Typing it in on the remote five different times with "Steve" at tech support is a blast after having already done it five times in futility. It's also fun when he tells you that you need to change your WIFI password so the TV can accept it after putting you on hold for 20 minutes while you hear pan flute music that will make you want to stab a babies face. Seriously, this is designed by imbeciles. No wonder they don't make it any more. If you want more frustration than value, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Schriner

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good tv.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice video quality and it has all of my streaming subscriptions built into the remote. What I don’t like is how it requires you to pay $19.99 a month for an app that acts like a remote for your tv. It makes typing so much easier, but I think it’s pretty scummy to charge for it.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Good TV for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV as a replacement for my existing Samsung TV my daughters tried to throw a phone charger through. Overall I am happy with the purchase of this TV. Picture quality is great and the sound is ok. Look up how to set up the picture setting for the best picture quality. Remote could use some help but that is why universal remotes are the way to go with TV's. If you are on the fence about this TV I would go ahead and purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Brutus

customer_reviews.title: 4k gaming tv! Low price ready for next gen  console
customer_reviews.text: In preparation for the xbox one x I upgraded to this tv at $400. While the industry sets the norm at 4k it will be some time before I upgrade to a top of the line tv. This tv has everything needed to enjoy the top online multyplayer shooters high resolutions and stay in competitive speeds. I will review this tv 15 days with all the details but so far so good. And amazon making these deals available is a god send during these tough times.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love it with a few minor complaints
customer_reviews.text: I love the tv but I seem to get more freezing and app issues using the smart tv than I did when using my Roku on a non-smart tv. Love the screen casting and the picture quantity is amazing. The sound (volume) could be better in the apps. A 15 would be loud for regular tv but require a 30+ for a streaming app. Other than the minor things it’s a great tv.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adore it!
customer_reviews.text: The TV works fantastically and has a variety of settings that can be customized per user's standards. The picture quality is amazing, and the auto-ambient lighting setting means NEVER having to get up to turn the lights on/off again. Set up was effortless when using the "Smart Things" app on my galaxy note 8, and it was done in minutes. I feel like the remote control can be designed a bit more efficiently, but works great nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: QueenTrizz

customer_reviews.title: Its huge!
customer_reviews.text: tv looks great. Hard to imagine what a 65" would look like on the wall but it is a massive tv. I love the tv, however, it pops a lot but from what i have read, it is normal. The internals heat the plastic case of the tv which causes the popping sounds and it goes away after 5 or so minutes. Also, when setting picture quality to warm 2 and warm 1, it stutters every four seconds. I leave mone on dynamic and have no issues. Good tv and the xurve aspect is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jo L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: My second Samsung 4K TV and set up and remote has not changed a lot so easy for me to use. Both Samsung's I bought had a really dark dim picture in a dark room and you can disable the ambient light detection and the picture is so much brighter and better. Really has a great picture for the price but I don't notice a difference between the curved screen and a flat screen. I have seen a lot more expensive TV's without a picture this nice.
customer_reviews.author: tpen007

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Glare and Ads
customer_reviews.text: I won't buy another smart TV again if I can help it. Like anything connected to the internet is a constant barrage of ads and sponsored content. It's really obnoxious and I don't know how to avoid it. I think I'm going to let a device manager my apps and remove the internet connection from the TV. It may not solve the issue 100% but it will minimize my time in the menus. I think the curved screen collects light sources because this TV always has glare. I didn't have this issue with a flat screen in the same location.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy setup, Connects with SmartThings by Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved my TV a day early. Followed the complete setup guide, plugged in the extra devices and connected it to my samsung galaxy. Setup is super easy and straight forward. Especially if you use "SmartThings" by Samsung. I'm a Systems Administrator and this is the first TV in 10 years a purchased for myself, I was excited when I saw how easy setup was and the picture quality is. Thank you Samsung and Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SysAdmin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with this TV, it works great, the picture quality is excellent! Unfortunately I'm unable to download some of the apps that I need on it such as the beach body on demand app, and I'm having a very difficult time casting from my phone to the television even though they're connected. I am able to cast from my iPad no problem though. Very nice TV overall very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good price good product
customer_reviews.text: Who buys TV’s from amazon? I guess I do... but I can’t say I’m disappointed. Searched forever for a curved 65” without having to pay an arm and a leg and came across this. Took the leap, bought the curved mount recommended with it and my husband set it up. The speaker could be better, but it easily connects with any speaker or device via Bluetooth. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bchaps

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great. Set up was easy (except pairing it with the phone app). Sound is great too. A lot of setting options to customize it to your taste. I hate the remote control. It’s too small and I’m always pushing the wrong button it’s easy to use I have to say that.
customer_reviews.author: marcog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks and sounds great. Arrived quickly with no damage. Setup was quick and easy as well. I measured and knew I had about 60” to work with, and that the curve would save me an inch or two. I wanted to larger screen I could get with a little room to be able to plug in and unplug things. I estimates correctly and this is the perfect size. The sound is good but I may still add Bluetooth speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Titaness Writes

customer_reviews.title: Great 4k Tv. Samsung has the best
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this tv, sound is good. Conns of the TV, I hate when I turn it off and when I get back to watching it. Its already on. I dont like that it turn on on its own. I have to kill the power to the tv for it to stop doing that. I have a firestick on it and samsung says if firestick turns on, so will the tv. Great tv that comes with samsung tv. When I turn a device off, I want it to stay off. Thats the only conn to this tv
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Morin

customer_reviews.title: Love this tv and would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love it, glad I chose the curbed over the flame since they may not make them much longer. Some of the reviews say it makes a glare reflecting from room lights. The only gare I had was from a rear lamp that sits behind me while I watch TV. I had to move it a little. My living room and dinning room are open and consist of about 10 different light fixtures and lamps and the only one that creates a glare is the one behind my couch where I watch TV. Its very bright in a couple picture modes and easily watched while letting in light from all windows and sliding glass door during bright summer days.
customer_reviews.author: jack reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tv
customer_reviews.text: So far, being the first day, this television is amazing. Picture is colorful, vibrant, and sharp. Setup was easy, including the WiFi install/setup. Sound could be better, but it’s a tv, nothing a soundbar can’t fix.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brimm

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv the picture is fantastic the sound is good we did add a sound bar, set was pretty straight forward you can download a app to your phone for basic tv functions, The alexa part you can turn the tv off and on lower or raise the button. In the set up if you have cable you can assign it and your remote that came with the tv will work the cable box. I just wished the alexa part could change the channel. overall it is a great tv
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Buy this tv!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! This tv is perfect. The picture is super clear, smart feature is great but could use more apps nothing a Roku can’t fix though! Overall very happy with the purchase and everyone should invest in buying a curve tv you can definitely tell a difference between this tv and the 60 inch regular Samsung we have in the living room. It’s definitely an experience!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: smarter than me
customer_reviews.text: Great picture but VERY difficult to program or get to different channels. No instruction manual. All instructions on online, website etc. Love the picture, hate the TV. Maybe using Alexis or Siri would make a lot of difference just using voice commands. Can't get the picture from cable to the right size, Can't get the sound bar to work, It won't recognize that an antenna is plugged in....etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Claridge

customer_reviews.title: Great tv, excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv! I’ve always preferred the curve, there is no bad viewing spot with these! Using this one in a large bedroom, sound quality is so good that I did not need a sound bar!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Mills

customer_reviews.title: What a TV!
customer_reviews.text: What an upgrade from my 15-year old Pioneer 50 inch TV! There is no comparison! Love the picture quality. The bonus is all the free channels that come with it. The only issue I have with the remote control. It is not intuitive like a fire TV. It requires some getting used to. But once you get used to it is a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Jahangir Kabir

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this TV for its picture quality and aesthetics. Its a great looking TV and the picture quality was terrific right out of the box. With so many smart TV options to choose from, this is one of the best-reviewed models that I came across and I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John W Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, remote sucks...
customer_reviews.text: Great TV, I wish samsung would've stuck with their Bluetooth remote. Also, it isn't very well laid out and intuitive which leads to alot of erroneous entries on the remote. But that being said the tv itself makes up for it, I highly recommend this tv!
customer_reviews.author: Ben B

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This tv was bought to replace my existing Sony. The UHD is a great asset; it work wonderful with Netflex ; mind you net flex wants a little more money to take advantage of UHD. Some reviewers say there is bloat ware. This is false. The control panel comes with a few extras loaded ; its netflex; prime video , Hulu. The picture for the money is awesome. The over all value from this TV is exceptional. The only thing that bothers is that the remote is hard to see in the dark. But otherwise the tv is an exceptional value for money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn C

customer_reviews.title: It came broken and they won’t replace it.
customer_reviews.text: I opened my box and screen was broken. They won’t replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather 13

customer_reviews.title: Movies make you feel like you are there
customer_reviews.text: Awesome picture - great sound after adjusting equalizer - great color - I did adjust setting from factory to get crisp bright picture and color - $617 what a deal - shipped fro California to Georgia over night - perfect condition - set up was easy - the curved screen gives you the qled picture - viewing angle is less than flat - bought it to watch movies not as room light - we got our couch sitting in front about 12 feet away - perfect - will admit if I could have found a 2019 75'' I would have considered it - very happy with size - picture
customer_reviews.author: joe ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Picture is great
customer_reviews.text: My husband spent 7 months in the hospital and we almost lost him. When he came home he wanted a new tv. What could I Say? We love everything about Our new tv. The picture and sound are fabulous! Thankyou
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is excellent. Sound is also very good. Coming from an old model flat screen, this TV is amazing. Its also a Smart TV and will access your cable box as soon as you turn it on. On the remote you have access to Netflix, Amazon movies and Hulu. Really easy to navigate from cable to Netflix and back. We had to use 3 remotes fro my old TV.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Screen bleeding; really disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The screen bleeding on this TV is absolutely horrible. Extremely obvious and i really would like my money back. The picture is clearly cheap and looks edge lit, not back lit. Really disappointed. Picture is what a “black” screen looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas fuller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal, Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the remote doesn’t have voice recognition like the other Samsung I had in this size. Everything else I love about it and it suits my living room space perfectly. I’m considering a sound bar to give it that extra sound, the volume sometimes on certain channels is low even when it’s turned up.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a quality large smart TV
customer_reviews.text: I like the viewing angles that the curved format gives you. Sound is not bad so you don't need to buy a sound bar unless you want one. We use it for the internet frequently and I wish there would be a keyboard and mouse on the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Myers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture! Only using the internet for streaming and "rabbit ears" for the broadcast channels. Cant tell the difference in picture between the two! No sound bar needed for me! Sound is awesome, loud and clear! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa P.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited anticipating my new tv. It came very quick I didn’t have to wait long. I ordered Alexia with it. Everything was so compatible and easy to set up. The delivery guys was so gentle. I love it. Since this is my first smart tv I had to get use to the high definition of the tv. Everyone that visits is so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected, except the trim color.
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely better than the 2019 model however the trim is still black. But the sources set up is nicer it feels smoother and the remote was built way better even though its similar to the fire stick remotes. The connection between devices are much better as well.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Speers

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for Me!
customer_reviews.text: My first curved TV. I’ve had zero issues so far. It’s got beautiful picture quality, the curve draws you in, and it looks all sorts of snazzy in my living room. It is Alexa capable, but it seems like that’s really only to turn it off and on, which is slick, but I wish it could perform remote functions (play etc on Netflix) but that might be a little optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Urban

customer_reviews.title: What’s the deal with this remote?
customer_reviews.text: 5 years ago I bought this set in the 55 inch size. I wouldn’t get any other tv, it’s just exceptional. So I got a 65” set and it’s just as perfect. The curved screen may be a gimmick but I love it. I will keep buying this one as needed until they no longer make them. But the remote? That’s a hard no. A better, more friendly remote should be available like it was for the 55” tv.
customer_reviews.author: Cb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t pay!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t pay!!!! I called the manufacturer and they would not fix the LED light that went out. I bought the TV less then Six months ago.
customer_reviews.author: sims8

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 10 year old samsung that died. Picture quality and over all set is much better. I did have one issue, took longer to setup then any other set. I had to sign in to all the services, most of witch I forgot my password, blah blah blah. I miss the good old days plug it in and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Phil DeDog

customer_reviews.title: Omg. We love our New Smart UHD TV.
customer_reviews.text: Omg. We love our new TV. Thank you amazon. Well delivered. Excellent picture quality and great for the family. An awesome experience. Glad we made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Just Way Awesome!  Samsung 65inch Curve TV
customer_reviews.text: I thought my 55 inch Curve was cool but this 65 UHD is way more awesome! The only drawback is having to set up the Samsung Account to download apps. Other than that the screen is beautiful, casing is luxurious, and price is good. SAMS had this a bit cheaper but I didn't want to deal with the lines. However, this TV is work every Penny!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: we love this screen. really like the curve effect. did not have any problems with viewing at a different angle as reported. i can view from any room and see no distortion. I have screen installed in large open area that is visible from kitchen dining etc. would buy again! We use sound system so cant really have an opinion on the sound.
customer_reviews.author: PattyJo

product_meta.title: Samsung UN55RU7300FXZA Curved 55-Inch 4K UHD 7 Series Ultra HD Smart TV with HDR and Alexa Compatibility (2019 Model)
product_meta.description: Style:2019 Edition| Size:55-InchSee all your favorite entertainment as it was meant to be seen with the Samsung UN55RU7300FXZA Curved 55-Inch 4K UHD 7 Series Ultra HD Smart TV. Featuring a powerful 4K UHD processor, this UHD Smart TV offers 4x the resolution (3, 840 x 2, 160) of Full HD 1080p HDTV. The 4K UHD processor instantly upscale content to 4K-level picture quality, even from non-native 4K sources, allowing you to enter the world of 4K with every show, season, and scene. Adding to the level of realism, the TV includes HDR (High Dynamic Range) and Proctor to reveal millions of shades of color with a vibrant, lifelike picture that HDTV can’t create. Ultra Slim Array dynamically fine tunes the deepness of the blacks to the brightness of the whites for a picture with sensational contrast. The slim curved design of the Samsung RU7300 lets you experience a new level of immersive viewing with Auto Depth Enhancer to pull you into the action. The Samsung 7 Series UHD TV includes smart features such as One Remote, on-screen universal guide, smart speaker expandability with Alexa and Google Assistant compatibility, and more. BLUETOOTH CAPABILITY only supports audio profiles such as Ear Buds, Headphones, and Soundbars, but does not support Human Interface Devices such as a keyboards.
feature_bullets: 4K UHD processor: Powerful 4K UHD processor optimizes your TV’s performance by upscaling every show, season, and scene with 4K picture quality
Enhanced detail with HDR: 4K depth of detail with high dynamic range lets you see shades of color that reveal more detail than HDTV can deliver

Purcolor reveals spectrums of color: Millions of shades of color reveal a vibrant, lifelike picture that conventional HDTV can’t create. Power supply (V) - AC110-120V 50/60 hertz. Maximum power consumption: 135

Smart TV features: Simple on-screen universal guide to find streaming content and live TV shows, One Remote A to control all compatible devices, smart speaker expandability with Alexa and Google Assistant compatibility, and more
Curved screen design: Get pulled into the action with auto depth enhancer on curved TVs for immersive viewing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,243 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
